data.title: Matti Manushulu
data.meta_description: Matti Manushulu  is a 1990 Indian Telugu-language drama film written and directed by B. Narsing Rao starring Archana. The film won the Best Feature Film in Telugu at the 38th National Film Awards, For portraying the stark reality of pain which has been underlined with the warm hues of life as cited by the Jury.

Telugu Top Item Songs Lyrics List: The Item Songs That Took Tollywood by Storm.

In Tollywood, item songs have a dedicated fan base. That's why directors and producers are always eager to include special songs in their commercial films. Many item songs have been released in Tollywood so far, but some have remained unique forever. Even as years pass and new item songs emerge, the mark these songs left on audiences will never fade. So, what are these songs? Who are the actors and actresses featured in them? What are the lyrics like? Let’s find out in this special story. Kaavaalayyaa (Jailer) The film "Jailer" was directed by Nelson Dilip Kumar, with Rajinikanth in the lead role. Tamannaah appeared in a special role in this film. Not only that, but she also performed some amazing dance moves in the special song "Nuvvu Kaavaalayyaa." After its release, the song became a huge sensation on social media, with many influencers creating reels on it.
